T02TD2330E:270a-1: sha ta dharma au pa de sha n'a ma /
T02TD2330E:270a-3: chos drug gi man ngag ces bya ba /
T02TD2330E:270a-4: dpal bde mchog 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2330E:270a-6: rnal 'byor don gyi snying po btsal //
T02TD2330E:270b-0: rnal 'byor lus kyi rtsa yi @270b tshogs //
T02TD2330E:270b-1: phra rags rlung dang ldan pa ni //
T02TD2330E:270b-3: dbyung rngub dgang dang gzhil ba ste //
T02TD2330E:270b-4: la la n'a dang ra sa n'a //
T02TD2330E:270b-5: aa wa dh'u t'i 'khor lo bzhi //
T02TD2330E:270b-6: lte bar tsanda l'i yi me //
T02TD2330E:270b-7: phra rab las 'phel h'am las ni //
T02TD2330E:270b-8: bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun dga' bzhi'i 'gros //
T02TD2330E:270b-9: rgyu mthun la sogs 'bras bu bzhi //
T02TD2330E:270b-11: ts'ar+ya pa'i au pa de sho'o /
T02TD2330E:270b-13: // / snod bcud khams gsum ma las pa //
T02TD2330E:270b-14: sgyu ma rmi lam la sogs dpes //
T02TD2330E:270b-16: lha tshogs sgyu ma me long gzugs //
T02TD2330E:270b-17: rdo rje sems dpa' legs bris pa //
T02TD2330E:270b-18: gzugs brnyan gsal bar snang dang mtshungs //
T02TD2330E:270b-19: de nyid sgyu ma'i gzugs bzhin du //
T02TD2330E:270b-20: sgyu dpe bcug gnyis ltar mthong ba //
T02TD2330E:270b-21: rnal 'byor sgyu ma'i don mthong ba'o //
T02TD2330E:270b-22: n'a g'a dzu na'i au pa de sha'o /
T02TD2330E:270b-24: // / rmi lam rmi lam don shes shing //
T02TD2330E:270b-25: rgyun du zab mo'i don bsgom pa //
T02TD2330E:270b-26: n'a da thig le la sogs pa //
T02TD2330E:270b-27: rigs lnga'i sa bon la dmigs nas //
T02TD2330E:270b-28: sangs rgyas zhing dang sangs rgyas blta //
T02TD2330E:270b-29: gnyid dus bde chen sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02TD2330E:270b-30: la ba pa'i au pa de sha'o /
T02TD2330E:270b-32: // / rnal 'byor aa wa dh'u t'i pa //
T02TD2330E:270b-33: aa wa dh'u t'ir sems gnas pa //
T02TD2330E:270b-34: snying gi thig ler sems brtan pas //
T02TD2330E:270b-37: nyi ma zla ba shar 'dra dang //
T02TD2330E:270b-38: lha dang sku yi snang ba sogs //
T02TD2330E:270b-39: sna tshogs zhing khams dag par 'gyur //
T02TD2330E:270b-40: rnal 'byor pa yi lam chen te //
T02TD2330E:270b-41: n'a g'a rdzu na'i au ba de sha'o /
T02TD2330E:270b-45: dbang po rnams dang 'byung ba sdud //
T02TD2330E:270b-46: zla nyi rlung rnams snying gar 'dus //
T02TD2330E:270b-48: rnam shes phyi rol yul song na //
T02TD2330E:270b-49: rmi lam yul bzhin sna tshogs snang //
T02TD2330E:270b-50: bdun bdun dus tshe'i 'chi snang dang //
T02TD2330E:270b-51: de nas skye bar 'gyur ba nyid //
T02TD2330E:270b-52: de tshe lha yi rnal 'byor sgom //
T02TD2330E:270b-53: yang na de nyid ngang la gzhag / de rjes skye la phyogs pa'i tshe //
T02TD2330E:270b-54: mnga' bdag lha yi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD2330E:270b-55: snag srid lha yi rnal 'byor sgom //
T02TD2330E:270b-56: des ni bar do khegs par 'gyur //
T02TD2330E:270b-57: su kha si dhi'i au pa de sha'o /
T02TD2330E:271a-2: grong 'jug lha dang sa bon gyis //
T02TD2330E:271a-4: lha la bslab cing 'phar ba'i dus //
T02TD2330E:271a-6: grong du 'bo na stong ra lha //
T02TD2330E:271a-7: yam sprod hi ka h'um dang h'um //
T02TD2330E:271a-8: lha dang bla ma'i thug skar 'phang //
T02TD2330E:271a-10: su kha sidhi'i au pa de sha'o /
T02TD2330E:271a-12: // / grub pa'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug til li pa'i zhabs kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2330E:271a-14: // / rgya gar gyi mkhas pa n'a ro pandi ta dang /
T02TD2330E:271a-15: mar pa lho brag pa chos kyi blo gros kyis kha che'i gnas pushpa ha rir bsgyur ba'o//
